Package gw.api.admin

Class MessagingUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.admin.MessagingUtil
public class MessagingUtil extends Object
Provides utility functions supporting messaging admin screens.
Author:
cgross

    • getEventMessages

      public static EventMessage[] getEventMessages(Long sooKeyValue)
      Find all messages related to the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object are returned.
      Parameters:
      sooKeyValue - the id of safe ordered value
      Returns:
      array of message dto objects

    • getEventMessageDestinationMap

      Returns:
      the map of destination to name

    • getEventMessagesForDestination

      public static EventMessage[] getEventMessagesForDestination(Integer destId, Long sooKeyValue)
      Deprecated.
      use method returning query
      Returns all messages for the specified destination and the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object and targeted at the destination are returned.
      Parameters:
      destId - the destination maybe null
      sooKeyValue - the id of safe ordered value
      Returns:
      array of message dto objects

    • getEventMessagesForDestination

      public static IQueryBeanResult<Message> getEventMessagesForDestination(Integer destId, Long sooKeyValue, int chunkSize)
      Returns all messages for the specified destination and the safe ordering object (e.g. claim) identified by sooKeyValue. If the sooKeyValue is negative, all messages that are unrelated to any safe ordering object and targeted at the destination are returned.
      Parameters:
      destId - the destination maybe null
      sooKeyValue - the id of safe ordered value
      chunkSize - this is a database chunksize, it is used to define how many records are returned in each chunk. If you are doing paging you may want to use the number of rows as this value, it is still upto the caller to limit the number of 'next' calls if they only want that number of rows.
      Returns:
      a query over messages

    • skipMessages

      public static void skipMessages(EventMessage[] messages)
      Deprecated.
      use the Message version instead
      Skips all of the specified messages. The messages will be removed from the send queue and not dispatched.
      Parameters:
      messages - array of message dto objects

    • getDestinationInfo

      public static MessageDestinationInfo[] getDestinationInfo()

    • getDestinationStatus

      public static MessageDestinationStatus getDestinationStatus(int destId)
      Return operational status (which can be up to REFRESH_INTERVAL_IN_MILLISECONDS seconds stale) of the specified destination. Returns TC_UNKNOWN if ownership or status in flux, such as the destination actively being migrated between servers. REFRESH_INTERVAL_IN_MILLISECONDS has a default of 5000. Use JVM parameter -Dgw.messaging.destination.status.refresh.intervalInMillis=.... when starting the appserver to override this if needed. This method will return a cached value if it has been called within the last REFRESH_INTERVAL_IN_MILLISECONDS seconds. We use caching here to avoid overwhelming the destination node with frequent requests, since they will incur a network call if the current server is not the owner of the destination in a clustered deployment.
      Parameters:
      destId - the destination id as specified in messaging-config.xml
      Returns:
      MessageDestinationStatus representing the current state of the destination

    • getDestinationStatusNow

      public static MessageDestinationStatus getDestinationStatusNow(int destId)
      Return current operational status of the specified destination. Returns TC_UNKNOWN if ownership or status in flux, such as the destination actively being migrated between servers This method does not return a cached status. The preferred method to call is getDestinationStatus() since that method uses a cache.
      Parameters:
      destId - the destination id as specified in messaging-config.xml
      Returns:
      MessageDestinationStatus representing the current state of the destination

    • isSuspendedState

      public static boolean isSuspendedState(MessageDestinationStatus status)
      Returns true if the status provided indicates the destination is suspended, stopped, or in the process of becoming so. Returns false if the destination is being started, running, or unknown.
      Parameters:
      status - MessageDestinationStatus to be checked
      Returns:
      True if status indicates the destination is suspended, stopped, or becoming so. False otherwise.
